mapper.sql: AREA_CODE, AREA_NAME, AREA_FRAME, ORDER_NO, PARENT_AREA_CODE, START_DATE, END_DATE, AREA_LEVEL, VALIDFLAG, AREA_CODE1, AREA_CODE2, REMARK, PARA, PARA_ID, PARA_VALUE, `STATUS`, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select: select AREA_CODE,AREA_NAME from t_area where AREA_LEVEL = #{area_level,jdbcType=INTEGER} and VALIDFLAG = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_area (AREA_NAME, AREA_FRAME, ORDER_NO, PARENT_AREA_CODE, START_DATE, END_DATE, AREA_LEVEL, VALIDFLAG, AREA_CODE1, AREA_CODE2, REMARK, PARA, PARA_ID, PARA_VALUE, `STATUS`, CREATE_TIME) values (#{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaFrame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{validflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{para,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paraId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paraValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_area
AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_FRAME = #{areaFrame,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_AREA_CODE = #{parentAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=INTEGER},

VALIDFLAG = #{validflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AREA_CODE1 = #{areaCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE2 = #{areaCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PARA = #{para,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARA_ID = #{paraId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARA_VALUE = #{paraValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_area set AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_FRAME = #{areaFrame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_AREA_CODE = #{parentAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_LEVEL = #{areaLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VALIDFLAG = #{validflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_CODE1 = #{areaCode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_CODE2 = #{areaCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARA = #{para,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARA_ID = #{paraId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARA_VALUE = #{paraValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
